Game_of_Life

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Game_of_Life.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Board to create a Board object with the required variables. A board object is a matrix of Cell objects which will be required to make easier the logic of the game. In addition, this class contains the methods and functions to manage and work with Board objects.
    Author:
    David Mendez Merino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board()
      Default constructor for Board (no parameters) By default the board will have 60 rows and 120 columns The constructor calls "inicialise_board" to inicialise the Cells of the matrix
      Board(int r, int c)
      Parameterised constructor for Board The constructor calls "inicialise_board" to inicialise the Cells of the matrix
